article: Miss Wang is twenty-three years  _  . She likes children and her  _  work. From Monday to Friday she stays at  _  and gives the children classes. She has much work  to do  , but she often plays sports  _  her students after school. The children like  _  very much.  _  Saturday she drives her car to her father's house and  stays  with her father and mother. Sometimes she goes to see her friends on Sunday. She drives back  _  school on Monday morning. She  likes  singing and swimming. She's a nice girl.
